title: BETA1.4骷髅射手将会有新的用处——喂狗（狼？）（不知道火星了没）
author: Hetairoi
txt_content:
In Beta 1.4, bones will be used to feed wild wolves in order to tame them.
来源：http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Bone
哈哈！总觉得每天天亮了之后地上一把一把的骨头挺浪费的，这下终于有大用处了——喂给小狼，变成宠物（狗？）。

replies.author: tl10
replies.txt_content:
回复 Hetairoi 的帖子

老顾你这是调戏我

replies.author: howard
replies.txt_content: 我比較喜歡等天亮後去看他們燒死 再去收屍= =

replies.txt_content: 1.4最好能在我有电脑后才出来，当然那是很久之后的事.....

replies.txt_content: 刚刚升级完成，但还没见到一根狼毛

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content: 1.4版刚推出~~快去更新~~找狼养狗去~~

replies.author: WuTianFang
replies.txt_content: skeletons is very died now, because everyone wants to kill him.{:skeleton:}{:slime:}{:slime:}

replies.author: WuTianFang
replies.txt_content: Everybody, I don't know how to get the fire for my bag. Can you guys helping me?

replies.txt_content: Everybody, I do not know how to use more fact for the wool. Can you guys helping me?
